title: Practice occupational health and safety procedures
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Identify hazards and risks.
>Evaluate hazards and risks.
> Control hazards and risks and
> Maintain occupational health and safety awareness.

title: Use hand tools
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Plan and prepare tasks to be undertaken.
> Prepare and distinguish classification of hand tools.
> Use appropriate hand tools an test equipment and
> Maintain hand tools.

title: Perform mensuration and calculation
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Select and distinguish measuring instrument.
> Carry out measurement and calculation and
> Maintain measuring instrument.

title: Prepare and interpret technical drawings
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Identify different kinds of technical drawings.
> Interpret technical drawings and
> Make changes to electrical electronic schematic and drawings.

title: Perform Computer Operations
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Plan and prepare for termination connection of electrical wiring circuits.
> Terminate connection of electrical electronics wiring circuits and
> Connect electrical electronics wiring circuits.

title: Terminate and connect electrical wiring  and electronics circuit
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
>Plan and prepare for termination connection of electrical wiring circuits
>Terminate connection of electrical electronics wiring circuits and
>Connect electrical electronics wiring circuits

title: Assemble/ disassemble consumer electronics products and systems
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Plan and prepare for termination connection of electrical wiring circuits.
> Terminate connection of electrical electronics wiring circuits and
> Connect electrical electronics wiring circuits.

title: Maintain and repair audio/ video products and systems
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Enumerate, explain and apply OHS policies and procedures in maintaining Audio/Video systems.
> Enumerate, explain and apply OHS policies and procedures in repairing Audio/Video systems.
> Identify and explain the functions of different tools for maintaining and repairing Audio/Video systems.
> Apply symptoms diagnosis and systematic pre-testing procedures and
> Troubleshoot Audio/Video systems.

title: Maintain and repair electronically- controlled domestic appliances
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Enumerate, explain and apply OHS policies and procedures in maintaining electronically controlled appliances.
> Enumerate, explain and apply OHS policies and procedures in repairing electronically controlled appliances.
> Interpret the principles of operation of electronic symbols and block sections of schematic diagram.

title: Maintain and repair cellular phones
lo:
The students/trainees will be able to:
> Enumerate, explain and apply OHS policies and procedures in maintaining cellular phones.
> Enumerate, explain and apply OHS policies and procedures in repairing cellular phones.
> Interpret the principles of operation of electronic symbols and block sections of schematic diagram and
> Apply symptoms diagnosis and systematic pre-testing procedures.
